reviewText: received as promised and in good condition
This series marked a decline in the content and viewing pleaseure oft his series. Always enjoyed watching till no when it became an effort
We love this series.  We have purchased series 13 and 14 with just the dutch subtitles and are happy to report that the dialogues are loud and clear and we don't need english sub-titles.
Love this series. Hope they make more of it as we thoroughly enjoy watching it. The characters are so real and the investigations into crimes are exceptionally interesting.
